imdb.plot outline: "Taking on America" is an electrifying miniseries that follows some of the hottest music acts breaking into the U.S music scene. From South American urban artists to Spanish DJs, these stars travel to the States to make it big, tearing up stages along the way. Cameras join these up-and-coming artists through a whirlwind of rehearsals and performances. But even though these guys work hard, they also play hard. From jet-skiing to skydiving, our artists take on some of the most exciting experiences America has to offer. Throughout the series, we get an inside glimpse into their journey - where they have come from, where they are going and their unique take on America. So come along with Flama and get an exclusive look as these artists live life to the fullest and take America by storm.
imdb.title: Taking on America
plot: An exhilarating franchise profiling the hottest acts breaking into the American music scene.

"_Taking on America_ (qv)" is an electrifying miniseries that follows some of the hottest music acts breaking into the U.S music scene. From South American urban artists to Spanish DJs, these stars travel to the States to make it big, tearing up stages along the way. Cameras join these up-and-coming artists through a whirlwind of rehearsals and performances. But even though these guys work hard, they also play hard. From jet-skiing to skydiving, our artists take on some of the most exciting experiences America has to offer. Throughout the series, we get an inside glimpse into their journey - where they have come from, where they are going and their unique take on America. So come along with Flama and get an exclusive look as these artists live life to the fullest and take America by storm.
